[[File:TolkienIndex.png: The '''Tolkien Index''' is a not-for-profit website which aims to produce a comprehensive index of names from writings by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] (and associated editorial matter) on [[Middle-earth]] which do not already have an index.<ref>{{webcite
column5: accessed=01-Jan-2012}}</ref> [[Morgan Thomsen]] is the owner and main contributor of the website, whilst Daniel Helen is its webmaster.<ref>{{webcite
column9: accessed=23-June-2012}}</ref> It was founded on [[24 June]], [[2011]].<ref>{{webcite

[[File:TolkienIndex.png: Noting the website Tolkien Index in November 2011, ''Tolkien Transactions'', an on-line review journal, wrote: "''[t]rusting that the authors will continue the work, this promises to be a very valuable index resource''".<ref>{{webcite
